羃字的基本解释

羃
mì
〔羃??（
古同“幂”，覆盖：“解紵衣以羃之。”l?）〕古代遮蔽脸部的巾，如“武德、贞观之时，宫人骑马者，依齐、隋旧制，多著羃羃。”

羃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mì］
［《廣韻》莫狄切，入錫，明。］
同“冪1”。
(1)覆盖。
(2)遮盖食物的帕子。

羃字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【网字部】　羃； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页950第08
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫狄切，音覓。冪或作羃。覆也。【玉篇】蓋食巾。又羃羅，婦人所戴。　又【類篇】羃䍥，煙貌。

羃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
羃字的起名意思

暂无。

veil
Basic explanation of words
veil
mì
〔veil??(
In ancient times, it is the same as "power", covering: "Untie the clothes to make them." l?)] Ancient towels that covered the face, such as "In the time of Wude and Zhenguan, the palacemen on horseback, the old system of Yiqi and Sui, many books Lean."
veil
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mì］
["Guangyun" Modiqie, enter the tin, and Ming. ]
Same as "Power 1".
(1) Covering.
(2) A veil to cover food.
veil
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Web character department] 　羃; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 950 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Modiqie, Yinmi. Power or make lean. Cover also. [Jade articles] Cover napkins. And Liang Luo, worn by a woman.　[Classes] A stalemate, a smoky appearance.
